text:
Hi guysm I am building a classifier and saving it as pickle file to put in the production environment. I am wondering what is the best practice to record the features set selected by feature selection during model building?

An alternative that I can think about is maintaining a text file containing a feature set, e.g.

_selected_features.txt_
```feature1
feature3
feature9```
And then, the script (that runs the classifier), read that file and slice incoming data only on those features.

Is there any better alternatives rather than maintaining the text file? I can see the issue arises due to manual update of text file when updating the classifier, since the updated version could probably use different set of features.
